extensionAttribute.description: Displays the name of the baseline file that is being used
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh # # mSCP-BaselineVersion.sh # Written by Jordan Burnette (jburnette@vcu.edu) # Last modified 2022.07.26 by Jordan Burnette ###### Description # Lists all items in /Library/Preferences, greps for any plist that starts with org and ends in audit.plist, # then prints the last section of that content as the result for the EA ######
result=$(ls -l /Library/Preferences | grep "org.*.audit.plist" | awk '{print $NF}') /bin/echo "<result>${result}</result>"
